body_html:
I think the we had multiple conversations going on here.
1- Looks like we are open for contributions here, if you would like to create a PR to fix the issue, @ebrevdo agreed to review the fix.

2- It looks like our testing does not catch this issue. I was trying to see what we have for rnns as unit tests. We obviously need to expand them to catch this problem, and fix the issue. The fix can be packaged with an extension to the unit test for RNN.
body_text:
I think the we had multiple conversations going on here.
1- Looks like we are open for contributions here, if you would like to create a PR to fix the issue, @ebrevdo agreed to review the fix.
2- It looks like our testing does not catch this issue. I was trying to see what we have for rnns as unit tests. We obviously need to expand them to catch this problem, and fix the issue. The fix can be packaged with an extension to the unit test for RNN.
body:
I think the we had multiple conversations going on here.
1- Looks like we are open for contributions here, if you would like to create a PR to fix the issue, @ebrevdo agreed to review the fix.

2- It looks like our testing does not catch this issue. I was trying to see what we have for rnns as unit tests. We obviously need to expand them to catch this problem, and fix the issue. The fix can be packaged with an extension to the unit test for RNN.
